results.name: Continued fraction for zeta(3).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Apery's Constant
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(zeta(3)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b013631.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 20 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, John Morrison (John.Morrison(AT)armltd.co.uk)
